dublinCore.title: 113 HR 1198 IH: To provide for American Samoa and the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands to be treated as States for certain criminal justice programs.
dublinCore.rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Sablan (for himself and Mr. Faleomavaega) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To provide for American Samoa and the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands to be treated as States for certain criminal justice programs.

section.header: Treatment as a State for American Samoa and the CNMI
section.text: Section 901(a)(2) of Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 ( 42 U.S.C. 3791(a)(2) ) is amended by striking Islands: and all that follows through the period and inserting Islands;.
